title: My Ideal Star Guardian Universe
body:
_So, in this ideal universe of mine, the first two seasons stay the same because they were great. Therefore, this list will be comprising of this third season and conceptual future ones. Without further ado, let us begin._
Season Three:
 Xayah(Legendary)
Rakan(Legendary)
Neeko(Epic)
Bard(Epic)
_These choices were made because I think, being the villain, Zoe should've gotten the legendary that we may find out more about her lore through dialogue interactions. With Bard being the villain(and herald for future villains), this wouldn't be a problem since he only makes chime noises._
Season 4(April Fools):
Urgot(Legendary)
Kog'Maw(Epic)
Fiddlesticks(Epic)
Rek'Sai(Epic)
_These could appear in a dream so they wouldn't need to be canonical, technically speaking, while still giving the playerbase what they ~~want~~ need(With, perhaps, the exception of Kog'Maw, who could possibly function as the Star Guardian team's pet)._
Season 5(Finale):
Zoe(Ultimate)
Aurelion Sol(Legendary)
Vi(Epic)
Quinn(Epic)
Sona(Epic)
_What with this being the grand finale, I see no problem in having both an Ultimate and a Legendary skin in the lineup. Zoe, of course, would be the ultimate(ha, ha) antagonist, with Aurelion Sol by her side. These skins' arrival would be accompanied by a PVE event, or, if Riot wouldn't even do that for the SG Finale, at least a new gamemode. In conclusion, Riot, if you're watching, please take these ideas into consideration. I do realize that the April Fools one is the only idea you could really fully take, but even that would be simply amazing. Thank you all for coming to my TED talk._

-Gravesoul

_Excellent question! What I was thinking was she could start out looking like a regular Star Guardian and then gradually change into a darker version as she does in her recall animation, her skin evolving slightly each time she blinks or teleports._
Ohhh a cool new transformation system! Seems promising!
Tbh star guardian morgana needs to be a thing.
Why would Aurelion Sol be a villain? Frankly I always saw him as either the First Star or First Star adjacent. "First Star Aurelion Sol" already sounds like a skin anyway.

Hm, personally I would prefer either a "mother figure" as the first star {{champion:43}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:37}} or an evil woman, if the first star turns out to not be as noble as it seems {{champion:28}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:246}}

There was someone who suggested a Star Mother Kayle, but I still like the idea of Aurelion Sol literally being the First Star. He's not only a being as old as the universe already, but he created all the stars in the cosmos. Who's to say he can't create Star Guardians to protect them?

I definitely understand the base of your idea for First Star Aurelion Sol.

It's just.... I never imagined the biggest leader of the Star Guardians to be a lizard.

Giving Vi a Star Guardian skin without Caitlyn at her side is a crime. They should both become members of the same Star Guardian team, they are Piltover's Finest!

_______________

Also, as an Urgot main and huge fan of the Star Guardians: PLEASE NO STAR GUARDIAN URGOT

If anything, make him an ancient space horror they have to fight, but not an actual Star Guardian.
